* Loop
*
* No-use script for showing high mips rates on the screen.
*
stopall
pause 1
sysclear
archmode esame
r 1A0=00000001800000000000000000000200 # z/Arch restart PSW
r 200=47000000 # noop
r 204=47000000 # noop
r 208=47000000 # noop
r 20C=47000000 # noop
r 210=47000000 # noop
r 214=47000000 # noop
r 218=47000000 # noop
r 21C=47000000 # noop
r 220=47000000 # noop
r 224=47000000 # noop
r 228=47000000 # noop
r 22C=47000000 # noop
r 230=47000000 # noop
r 234=47000000 # noop
r 238=47000000 # noop
r 23C=47000000 # noop
r 240=47000000 # noop
r 244=47000000 # noop
r 248=47000000 # noop
r 24C=47000000 # noop
r 250=47000000 # noop
r 254=47000000 # noop

r 5EC=47000000 # noop
r 5F0=47000000 # noop
r 5F4=47000000 # noop
r 5F8=47000000 # noop
r 5FC=47000000 # noop
r 600=47F00200 # B 200
*
ostailor null
cpu 0
restart
cpu 1
restart
cpu 2
restart
cpu 3 
restart
* Restart the same number of cpus as the underlying machine
